tool.name: Minfi Rset
tool.description: store Beta values and/or M values

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) MSet <- get(load('$input1'))
RSet <- ratioConvert(MSet, what = "both", keepCN = TRUE)
save(RSet,file = '$output1')

tool.help: RSet objects contains respectively the Beta value matrix, M value matrix and the Copy Number matrix.
